welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Alarobia, the charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our unique culture and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ivato International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Ivato International Airport handles all domestic flights within Madagascar.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ivato International Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi access is available throughout the airport for a fee.
